direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods construct HTTP requests with similar control flows and exception handling, differing mainly in the inclusion of an API key header.
Both methods build requests but for different protocols (HTTP vs WebSocket), sharing similar URL handling and request building patterns.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of the Request.Builder object, though the actual method is not explicitly defined in the class.
A method to validate the API key before building the request could be beneficial, though not explicitly defined in the class.
A method to verify the headers of the built request, ensuring the API key is correctly set, could be useful for assertions.
